author: CNN staff
title: Reopening the country: Dr. Sanjay Gupta's coronavirus podcast for April 20
description: What will it take, realistically, to re-open the country? Will we be able to return to normal in the near future? CNN Chief Medical Correspondent Dr. Sanjay Gupta speaks with former CDC Director, Dr. Tom Frieden about "boxing in" Covid-19.
content:
